tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in had raised an army and approached Chou and was demanding the Nine Cauldrons.

sense.def: mobilise (an army); raise (an army for a campaign)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in had raised an army and approached Chou and was demanding the Nine Cauldrons.

sense.def: move (often downwards) towards, approach (and arrive at); be situated close to JIA YI, "Mourning Qu Yuan": 命臨沒 "When life is about to come to an end".

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler of Chou, distressed,

sense.def: be vexed about; find ominous; be upset by, be greatly worried about, regard as disastrous (mostly a future prospect); be upset about; be distressed by

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: said Yen Shuai,

sense.def: Your Great Majesty

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: said Yen Shuai,

sense.def: be intensely worried about, be very concerned about, be very apprehensive about

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow me to seek succor in the east from Ch'i.'

sense.def: I, your servant (not necessarily minister or even official); I your son(!!!)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow me to seek succor in the east from Ch'i.'

sense.def: on the eastern side, in the eastern part of something; in the east [can perhaps also be taken as a nominal topic in many cases]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow me to seek succor in the east from Ch'i.'

sense.def: "borrow" (help N1 etc) (from someone N2)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow me to seek succor in the east from Ch'i.'

sense.def: succour; help, rescuing operation; rescue

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: 'My lord, the wickedness of Ch'in is now so great

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: 'My lord, the wickedness of Ch'in is now so great

sense.def: waywardness, wickedness, failure to follow the proper Way; lack of the Way

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: that she wishes to send her troops to Chou and demand the Nine Cauldrons.

sense.def: mobilise (an army); raise (an army for a campaign)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: that she wishes to send her troops to Chou and demand the Nine Cauldrons.

sense.def: dǐng tripod

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: have among them determined

sense.def: strategic thinking; precise strategic planning; planning based on calculations of profit and loss as well as likelihood of success

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: they will send them to your majesty's state.

sense.def: your distinguished 大國

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: Now, to sustain a country in peril

sense.def: "Now,", "In fact," introducing new subject for the discourse, and introducing non-narrative theoretical discourse.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: Now, to sustain a country in peril

sense.def: cause to persist> cause to survive, preserve, safeguard

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: Now, to sustain a country in peril

sense.def: fraught with grave danger, doomed to disaster (as a state), endangered

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: carries with it substantial wealth.

sense.def: abundant, substantial (profit etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Ch'i rejoiced

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Ch'i rejoiced

sense.def: (of persons) feel pleased, feel that one's needs are fully satisfied; (of things) be felt to be pleasant

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: and sent forth a brigade of fifty thousand troops

sense.def: an army (of so-and-so many men or of such-and-such a place)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: under Ch'en Ch'en-ssu to rescue Chou,

sense.def: ensure that someone does something> order someone to do something; dispatch someone to do something

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: under Ch'en Ch'en-ssu to rescue Chou,

sense.def: act as general

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: under Ch'en Ch'en-ssu to rescue Chou,

sense.def: come to (someone's) aid, come to the rescue of, support someone in adversity

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: and the Ch'in forces retired.

sense.def: troops, armed forces; military support; military force

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1

tls:text.tls:line: and the Ch'in forces retired.

sense.def: (of an army) withdraw

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: But when Ch'in requested the Nine Caulrdons as her due,

sense.def: be about to; will in the future; be going to

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler of Chou was once more distressed.

sense.def: be vexed about; find ominous; be upset by, be greatly worried about, regard as disastrous (mostly a future prospect); be upset about; be distressed by

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: said Yen Shuai again,

sense.def: Your Great Majesty

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: said Yen Shuai again,

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow your servant to go eastward and disencumber us.'

sense.def: I, your servant (not necessarily minister or even official); I your son(!!!)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow your servant to go eastward and disencumber us.'

sense.def: 子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'and allow your servant to go eastward and disencumber us.'

sense.def: resolve (a problem, a difficult situation); get free from

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: when he arrived in Ch'i;

sense.def: SHU: depend on politically (as on a powerful person), depend on (for life); derive profit from 甚賴之

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: when he arrived in Ch'i;

sense.def: your distinguished 大國

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不識大國何塗之從而致之齊？」

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: It remains only to know by what road they should be delivered to Ch'i.'

sense.def: recognise that S; be aware of an event, know that something happened; be sure whether something is the case 不識 "I have no idea"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不識大國何塗之從而致之齊？」

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: It remains only to know by what road they should be delivered to Ch'i.'

sense.def: decide to follow (advice or suggestions); follow intentions; obey (laws etc); act in accordance with (a tradition etc); LY: follow (a dynasty) and take one's values from; follow (a path[which is not an ordinary act of following behind])

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不識大國何塗之從而致之齊？」

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: It remains only to know by what road they should be delivered to Ch'i.'

sense.def: cause to arrive> bring/transport N1 to N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不識大國何塗之從而致之齊？」

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: It remains only to know by what road they should be delivered to Ch'i.'

sense.def: major one-track mud-road suitable for carts; road

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: replied the king of Ch'i.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: replied the king of Ch'i.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: coveted the Cauldrons

sense.def: plot for

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: to the sloughs of Shao-hai.

sense.def: amount of time; a space of time; the time

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'We shall ask for a road through Ch'u, then.'

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: 'We shall ask for a road through Ch'u, then.'

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: coveted the Cauldrons

sense.def: plot for

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: and plotted for them in the courts at She.

sense.def: amount of time; a space of time; the time

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: they will never leave.'

sense.def: then inevitably; then invariably

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: may we fetch the bronzes to Ch'i?'

sense.def: major one-track mud-road suitable for carts; road

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:text.tls:line: may we fetch the bronzes to Ch'i?'

sense.def: decide to follow (advice or suggestions); follow intentions; obey (laws etc); act in accordance with (a tradition etc); LY: follow (a dynasty) and take one's values from; follow (a path[which is not an ordinary act of following behind])

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 37, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 2

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: replied Yen Shui.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: replied Yen Shui.

sense.def: surely, doubtlessly; certainly; inherently

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: replied Yen Shui.

sense.def: in polite speech: take the liberty of V-ing; humbly permit oneself to, humbly allow oneself to (NB 竊不敢...)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: replied Yen Shui.

sense.def: acting for > for something; on someone's behalf; in someone's favour; for the sake of

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: replied Yen Shui.

sense.def: be vexed about; find ominous; be upset by, be greatly worried about, regard as disastrous (mostly a future prospect); be upset about; be distressed by

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

sense.def: for vinegar

tls:text.tls:line: are not so many vinegar jugs of sauce pots

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: are not so many vinegar jugs of sauce pots

sense.def: for pickled sauce

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: are not so many vinegar jugs of sauce pots

sense.def: ZGC: small earthenware container for fetching water

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: are not so many vinegar jugs of sauce pots

sense.def: and that is all, contraction of 而已 (note the problems of scope: sometimes what the restrictive quantification quantifies over is only the subject, sometimes only the object, and sometimes the whole verb phrase, and at still other times the main verb only. These distinctions have not so far been implemented in tls.)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: to be carried to Ch'i dangling from the hand or clutched to the breast.

sense.def: be carried along in one's breast-pocket

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: Nor can they be hustled off to Ch'i

sense.def: by imitating (something) to V

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: ninety thousand men drew a single bronze

sense.def: pull (a carriage)

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: both troops and officers,

sense.def: officers and men

tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3-

tls:text.tls:line: with the tackle and gear

sense.def: contraptions of all kinds

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: Now, though your majesty has the men for it,

sense.def: although in fact

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: Now, though your majesty has the men for it,

sense.def: have; own by right; have in one's possession or control

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: is the route by which they may be brought out.'

sense.def: in polite speech: take the liberty of V-ing; humbly permit oneself to, humbly allow oneself to (NB 竊不敢...)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: is the route by which they may be brought out.'

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: that you do not intend to present them at all,'

sense.def: numerous times, frequently; on several occasions; at frequent intervals

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: said the king.

sense.def: in spite of the difference> nonetheless, in spite of everything said

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: said the king.

sense.def: will never (in generalisations); at no time (during a certain period), never (無有 there never are any)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: said the king.

sense.def: and that is all, contraction of 而已 (note the problems of scope: sometimes what the restrictive quantification quantifies over is only the subject, sometimes only the object, and sometimes the whole verb phrase, and at still other times the main verb only. These distinctions have not so far been implemented in tls.)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: replied Yen Shuai.

sense.def: cheat through word or action; treat dishonestly, deceive; perpetrate fraud against 欺於

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: 'Let the king merely say outright by what route they are to come forth

sense.def: swiftly, quickly; rashly; in such haste

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 1.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 20, p. 38, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 3

tls:text.tls:line: 'Let the king merely say outright by what route they are to come forth

sense.def: fix, define, determine; give something its fixed definite form, establish firmly

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: request troops, nor demand food from his state.

sense.def: borrow (troops etc); ask to borrow (right of way etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: request troops, nor demand food from his state.

sense.def: ask for (what the other party might refuse to give)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: request troops, nor demand food from his state.

sense.def: Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 令弊邑以君之情謂秦王曰：

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: get my ruler to speak of your intentions to the king of Ch'in. He will say:

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: "The Duke of Hsyeh does not intend to harm Ch'in for the benefit of Han and Wei.

sense.def: cause to expand> benefit, work for

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: If you should order my ruler to make such a proposal to Ch'in,

sense.def: do one's honest and loyal best for (a superior, or the law)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: he will be obligated to Ch'i

sense.def: feel grateful towards

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: and Ch'i will get the eastern regions and become more powerful.

sense.def: increasingly; the more... the more; more, ever more

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: and Ch'i will get the eastern regions and become more powerful.

sense.def: become strong; gain in strength; become a superpower

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: Your fief of Hsyeh will be safe for generations,

sense.def: for generations on end; for generations to come

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in will not be greatly harmed

sense.def: become weak> be weakened

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: and as a result they will surely give great weight to good relations with Ch'i.'

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: He sent Han Ch'ing to Ch'in,

sense.def: and, accordingly,....; therefore

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使不藉兵乞食於西周。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: and asked neither troops nor food from West Chou.-45--48-

sense.def: borrow (troops etc); ask to borrow (right of way etc)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而使不藉兵乞食於西周。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.7, p. 28

tls:text.tls:line: and asked neither troops nor food from West Chou.-45--48-

sense.def: ask (something N1) (from someone N2) 乞諸其鄰

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30 Chou Tsui seeks to avert a Ch'in attack

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in attacked the army of Wei's general Hsi Wu at Yi-ch'yeh

sense.def: general of N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30 Chou Tsui seeks to avert a Ch'in attack

tls:text.tls:line: 'Your excellency had best prevent Ch'in's attack on Chou.

sense.def: prevent NP-ing

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30 Chou Tsui seeks to avert a Ch'in attack

tls:text.tls:line: The finest plan for Chao

sense.def: of higher quality, of superior quality; best

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30 Chou Tsui seeks to avert a Ch'in attack

tls:text.tls:line: she must at least suffer heavy casualties.

sense.def: OBI: hosts; numerous armed forces; the numerous armes forces; also: armed forces of an individual household

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30 Chou Tsui seeks to avert a Ch'in attack

tls:text.tls:line: she must at least suffer heavy casualties.

sense.def: be wounded; get injured; be afflicted by; be made ill by

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in anticipated having only to take Chou

sense.def: conquest of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: and her defeat at the hands of Chou -

sense.def: read braads: defeat, failure

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: before she can make peace with Wei,

sense.def: make peace with, negotiate on cooperation withy

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: then she will be faced with the whole country of Chao intact

sense.def: him/her/it/them

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: Your excellency will then have both turned back Ch'in and stabilized Chou.

sense.def: cause to withdraw

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: Wei cannot cope with her

sense.def: be able to bear with, be able to stand; be able to put up effective resistence

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: and must settle with her through your excellency -

sense.def: make peace with a contextually determiante person/object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: then again you will be in a strong position.

sense.def: be powerful, significant, striking; be in a strong position: be of great (political) weight 最重

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: If, in desperation,

sense.def: make peace with a contextually determiante person/object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: Wei should cope with Ch'in,

sense.def: be able to bear with, be able to stand; be able to put up effective resistence

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: then your excellency will have preserved Chou, caused Wei and Ch'in to have engaged one another

sense.def: cause to persist> cause to survive, preserve, safeguard

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: then your excellency will have preserved Chou, caused Wei and Ch'in to have engaged one another

sense.def: cause to fight each other

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: and Chao will be in an overwhelmingly important position.'

sense.def: political influence, political weight; political power

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.10, p. 30

tls:text.tls:line: and Chao will be in an overwhelmingly important position.'

sense.def: all subjects indiscriminately, all subjects without exceptions; without exception

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26 Chou's honouring of Shu-li Chi excused

tls:text.tls:line: and an honour of guard troops.

sense.def: very much, strongly; also: too much, excessively before VP: very; emphatic after VP: enormously, tremendously

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26 Chou's honouring of Shu-li Chi excused

tls:text.tls:line: and an honour of guard troops.

sense.def: show the proper and required respect for the contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26 Chou's honouring of Shu-li Chi excused

tls:text.tls:line: and upbraided Chou

sense.def: upbraid; reprove, criticise openly; reprimand publicly

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26 Chou's honouring of Shu-li Chi excused

tls:text.tls:line: for so honoring a guest from Ch'in.

sense.def: regard as being of great importance and as deserving great respect (a person or a thing); treat as important

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26 Chou's honouring of Shu-li Chi excused

tls:text.tls:line: 'he presented them with a great bell

sense.def: make a (typically formal) present of N2 to (mostly inferiors N1); send or pass on (as gift or message) N1 to N2

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26 Chou's honouring of Shu-li Chi excused

tls:text.tls:line: 'he presented them with a great bell

sense.def: bell (loan for zhǒng 鐘) [We need to create a new lexeme character with the correct pronunciation. CH]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: The Ch'iu-yu perished

sense.def: in the end, finally, as it turned out

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: The Ch'iu-yu perished

sense.def: lose out; be ruined, be annihilated, be ruined

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: for they had taken no precautions.

sense.def: necessary preparations, required measures; provisions

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: while in truth it was Ts'ai he was invading.

sense.def: in fact

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: while in truth it was Ts'ai he was invading.

sense.def: lauch a surprise invasion, launch a surprise attack; launch a stealthy attack

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: is a ravenous state

sense.def: bestial, ferocious

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: and her appetite is for Chou.

sense.def: [GULP UP>] annex

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: he sent forth his tallest troops in the front ranks

sense.def: the strongest, the superior

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: he sent forth his tallest troops in the front ranks

sense.def: frontline, the place up in front

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: but behind them were his strongest crossbows.

sense.def: vigorous, strong; powerful (of states)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: but behind them were his strongest crossbows.

sense.def: crossbowman

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: It was called guard of honor for Chi

sense.def: for the sake of appearances; on the face of it; in name only

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: but was in fact a cage.

sense.def: imprison, incarcerate; iussive: have (someone) imprisoned/incarcerated 魯囚之

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: Besides, should the ruler of Chou not love his country?

sense.def: love one's own state, care about one's own state BAOPUZI: 烈士之愛國也如家。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.3.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.5, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: it would being grief to you, your majesty.'

sense.def: cause to be worried, bother

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52 Su Tai frees Chou from a levy and wins a town for her

tls:text.tls:line: Han levied arms and provisions on Chou.

sense.def: ZUO Xuan 2: armoured soldier; heavily armed soldier

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52 Su Tai frees Chou from a levy and wins a town for her

tls:text.tls:line: Han levied arms and provisions on Chou.

sense.def: and 衛侯逐公叔戍與其黨，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: ciried the ruler of Chou in delight,

sense.def: be able to perform a contexually determinate action or achieve a contextually determinate quality

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: 'then I will request that our state follow your direction in all matters.'

sense.def: heed or conform to a contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: 'Has my lord not heard the plan of Ch'u?' he asked

sense.def: honorific in informal conversation: you; also n - pro: "you my Duke"; used both as subject and as object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: and her granaries are empty.

sense.def: the storehouses/granarie LSCQ

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: and in less than a month it would be taken."

sense.def: conquer (a city), take out (a military position)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: Now, however, Yung-shih has been under siege for five months and they have not been able to take it.

sense.def: besiege (typically a city); lay siege to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 楚王始不信昭應之計矣，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: and the ruler of Ch'u has begun to suspect Chao Ying's plan is unworkable.

sense.def: have or show trust in (someone or something)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: and it will be taken.

sense.def: be taken, be conquered

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: 'but my emissary has already left.'

sense.def: however; but

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: 'but my emissary has already left.'

sense.def: get on one's way; go one's way; walk off; leave the scene; be on one's way

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: 'why not take this opportunity to present Chou with the town of Kao-tu?'

sense.def: give (something) to (a beneficiary)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: replied Tai,

sense.def: hand over (something N2) to (someone N1), typically as demanded; give (as appropriate under the circumstances, but without having to)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: 'Chou would submit gratefully and throw in her lot with Han.

sense.def: cave in> surrender

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: burn Chou's passport tallies

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: burn Chou's passport tallies

sense.def: tally, seal of appointment; seal of office

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是公以弊高都得完周也，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: Thus my lord will gain the entire state of Chou in exchange for the rustic town of Kao-tu -

sense.def: my humble (city) 弊邑 (Zhou)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是公以弊高都得完周也，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: Thus my lord will gain the entire state of Chou in exchange for the rustic town of Kao-tu -

sense.def: whole (state etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'u could not, in the end, reduce Yung-shih and withdrew.

sense.def: in the end, finally, as it turned out

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.4.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.6, p. 26, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 53

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'u could not, in the end, reduce Yung-shih and withdrew.

sense.def: conquer (a city), take out (a military position)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.17, p. 35, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 54 Chou Tsui adviced on personal relations in the Ch'in court

sense.def: to commend as outstanding; commend for (a good quality); express approval

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.17, p. 35, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 54 Chou Tsui adviced on personal relations in the Ch'in court

tls:text.tls:line: 'It will be best if you praise the filial actions of the king of Ch'in

sense.def: loving respect for one's parents and ancestors (see also VIRTUE)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.17, p. 35, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 54 Chou Tsui adviced on personal relations in the Ch'in court

tls:text.tls:line: and you will have Ch'in on your side.

sense.def: honorific in informal conversation: you; also n - pro: "you my Duke"; used both as subject and as object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.17, p. 35, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 54 Chou Tsui adviced on personal relations in the Ch'in court

tls:text.tls:line: and you will have Ch'in on your side.

sense.def: have the cooperation and support of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.6.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.13, p. 33, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 55- Po Ch'i and the parable of the archer

tls:text.tls:line: In truth he is gifted in warfare

sense.def: be good at V-ing as a result of serious study

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 2.6.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.13, p. 33, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 55- Po Ch'i and the parable of the archer

tls:text.tls:line: and possessed of heaven's command.

sense.def: mandate (from Heaven etc)

tls:text.tls:line: When it does Chou will be in peril.

tls:text.tls:line: Your Highness had best stop him

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 75

tls:text.tls:line: But punishments had become harsh and mercy scarce;

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 75

tls:text.tls:line: But punishments had become harsh and mercy scarce;

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 75

sense.def: have only a little of or few of

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 75

tls:text.tls:line: the law existed only to bend the people to it.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 75

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:text.tls:line: After King Hui had taken control of government,

sense.def: be formally in charge of, deal with (administrative matters); sometimes used as a success verb: deal effectively with, govern properly, lead with natural authority

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:text.tls:line: 'When a minister is too powerful the country is in danger;

sense.def: be powerful, significant, striking; be in a strong position: be of great (political) weight 最重

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:text.tls:line: 'When a minister is too powerful the country is in danger;

sense.def: be in a precarious state; be fraught with danger, be doomed to imminent disaster; be endangered; to risk danger

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no.46, p. 54, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 77

tls:text.tls:line: when an attendant is too close your life is in danger.

tls:text.tls:line: Then gain came unbidden where they stood

sense.def: achieve, manage to bring into existence, lead to; insist on bring to completion, bring to fruition; make the utmost use of

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: Then gain came unbidden where they stood

sense.def: assets; what is profitable, what profits; what is in one's interest, benefit; objective interest; what one can aim for as profit

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: and their lands broadened while they sat at ease.

sense.def: peacefully and comfortably 安坐

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: and their lands broadened while they sat at ease.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: The Five Emperors, the Three Kings, the Five Hegemons,

sense.def: leader; paramount leader, hegemon 五霸

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: brilliant ruler or sage prince -

sense.def: enlightened 明主

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: one and all wished to win provinces,

sense.def: achieve, manage to bring into existence, lead to; insist on bring to completion, bring to fruition; make the utmost use of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: one and all wished to win provinces,

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: they did battle to extend their lands.

sense.def: continue in (a job or position); go on from something to something else 相續 "take over from one another"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: For much land they plied their armies,

sense.def: be bent on expansion, be expansive in action

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: For much land they plied their armies,

sense.def: from Qin times onwards: regular army; overall armed forces (could consist of up to a million men) 一軍

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.9; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: for a little they smote with halberds;

sense.def: chōng???: pierce, cut into

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.10; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: Today, if you would be pre-eminent among great states,

sense.def: bring equally under one's control; annex; add to what one has;

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.10; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: threaten mighty countries,

sense.def: large state commanding 10 000 war chariots

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.10; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: overset enemy nations,

sense.def: win against, cause to submit; subjugate

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.10; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: control all within the four seas,

sense.def: dominate systematically; have and keep effective and systematic control of; exercise political control over; organise occasionally inchoative; gain control over

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.10; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

tls:text.tls:line: control all within the four seas,

sense.def: everything within the four seas

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.10; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 56, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 81

sense.def: treat like a son; treat like one's children

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.11; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. i1

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.11; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. i1

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.11; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. i1

sense.def: get plunged into; be drowned by (calamities); be drowned in, be inundated with

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.12; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 85

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.13; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 85

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.14; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 85

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.2.15; tr. Crump 1979 no.47, p. 57, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 87

sense.def: be definable as, count as V-ing

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95 Chang Yi offers a persuasion that will make Ch'in master of the world

tls:text.tls:line: and to say nothing about a matter you do understand is acting in bad faith.

sense.def: be definable as, count as V-ing

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95 Chang Yi offers a persuasion that will make Ch'in master of the world

tls:text.tls:line: The minister who acts in bad faith with his king should be executed;

sense.def: be diligent

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95 Chang Yi offers a persuasion that will make Ch'in master of the world

tls:text.tls:line: Nevertheless,

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95

tls:text.tls:line: the empire, with Yen on the north and Wei in the south,

sense.def: (the state of Yān) which is in the north

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95

tls:text.tls:line: the empire, with Yen on the north and Wei in the south,

sense.def: (the state of Wèi) in the south

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95

tls:text.tls:line: Those in command will be incapable of killing

sense.def: the people

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.125, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 95

tls:text.tls:line: people are not willing to die in battle.

sense.def: risk one's life

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: and that has been her great accomplishment.

sense.def: very 甚病之人

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: Should her arms and armour fall to pieces,

sense.def: armour and weapons; military equipment (not nececessarily only armour and weapons specifically, compare 仁義 "morality")

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: her citizens sicken,

sense.def: citizen; citizenry

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: her stores be drained,

sense.def: various stockpiles; accumulated resources of all kinds; the various accumulated resources

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: and should she not gain hegemony,

sense.def: characterstic of a hegemon; characterised by the features of a hegemon

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: and should she not gain hegemony,

sense.def: positive reputation, good name; positive fame; fame (for something, e.g. as being courageous)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: the cause could be nothing other than

sense.def: other; diverse 異日

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.126, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 98

tls:text.tls:line: lack of loyalty89 on the part of the ministers.

sense.def: advising; advisory 謀臣

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: Let me venture to speak of days gone by.

sense.def: the past

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: Her lands waxed great and her troops mighty.

sense.def: become braoder> expand, be expanding

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: Her lands waxed great and her troops mighty.

sense.def: become strong; gain in strength; become a superpower

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: What she attacked she took,

sense.def: fight so as to win> fight a victorious battle, win a/the battle

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: What she attacked she took,

sense.def: attack so as to take, attack successfully

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: and her orders controlled the empire.

sense.def: decree; imperial announcement

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: and her orders controlled the empire.

sense.def: issue effective orders to: to command, to order; to order officially; issue an order to (ministers etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: sufficed for her boundaries;

sense.def: boundary

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: long walls and great dikes

sense.def: dike

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: warfare means life or death even to a great state.92

sense.def: warfare

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: warfare means life or death even to a great state.92

sense.def: large state commanding 10 000 war chariots

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 99

tls:text.tls:line: warfare means life or death even to a great state.92

sense.def: existence or otherwise

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: "Branch and root clear both away,

sense.def: cy: 削髮為僧cut off, pare off; cut up; cut down, truncate (territory); decimate; erase (writing) by cutting

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: "Branch and root clear both away,

sense.def: tree stump

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: "Branch and root clear both away,

sense.def: dig out; dig the ground for (medicinal roots etc); dig (a pond etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: "Branch and root clear both away,

sense.def: root, primarily root that grows horizontally

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: attacked her capital of Ying,

sense.def: lauch a surprise invasion, launch a surprise attack; launch a stealthy attack

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然則是一舉而伯王之名可成也，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: Thus in a single stroke Ch'in could have achieved hegemony

sense.def: characterstic of a hegemon; characterised by the features of a hegemon

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: which allowed her to reconstitute her shattered state,

sense.def: ruined

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: regroup her scattered population,

sense.def: scattered

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此固已無伯王之道一矣。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: This was undoubtedly the first time Ch'in lost her way on the road to hegemony.

sense.def: characterstic of a hegemon; characterised by the features of a hegemon

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: and stationed their armies below Mt. Hua,

sense.def: encamp at

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: and Ching isolated.

sense.def: be isolated; be without relations to others

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然則是一舉而伯王之名可成也，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.14; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: Thus in a single stroke you could have achieved hegemony

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.14; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: and brought the neighbouring Lords to your court.

sense.def: be made to come to court

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.14; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: and made terms with Wei.

sense.def: sue for peace with N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此固已無伯王之道二矣。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.15; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: This undoubtedly was the second time Ch'in lost her way on the road to hegemony.

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.15; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: This could not produce hegemony

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此固已無伯王之道三矣。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.15; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.127, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 101

tls:text.tls:line: and undoubtedly the third time Ch'in lost her way on the road to hegemony.

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.16; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: is a nation of the centre,

sense.def: central

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.16; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: populated by a heterogenous folk.

sense.def: mixed; all kinds of; unsorted, unclassified 雜佩 "all kinds of ornaments worn on the belt"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.16; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Orders are not obeyed

sense.def: orders; commands

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.16; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: it mustered all its troops

sense.def: citizen; citizenry

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.16; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: and stationed them at Ch'ang-p'ing

sense.def: (of an army) to encamp at

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.17; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Your majesty had a stratagem to break them with

sense.def: Your Great Majesty

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.17; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Your majesty had a stratagem to break them with

sense.def: deceitfulness; fraudulence, deceit; acts of deceit

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.18; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: without the loss of a single armoured soldier

sense.def: cause distress to; embitter

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.18; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: without the loss of a single armoured soldier

sense.def: member of people of common status 諸民

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.19; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: With Chao taken Han is certainly lost.

sense.def: (negatively:) alone, isolated; unaided by others

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.19; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: With Han lost Ching and Wei cannot stand by themselves.

sense.def: (negatively:) alone, isolated; unaided by others

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.19; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: With Ching and Wei unable to remain independent you would in this one stroke have ruined Han,

sense.def: destroy, smash; inflict serious damage on (physical objects), destroy (a state); ruin (the legal system); to do in (a person)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.19; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: so that Ch'i and Yen would be weakened in the east,

sense.def: to weaken

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.19; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: thus flooding out the Wei clan.

sense.def: flood out by way of military attack

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.20; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Your majesty could have waited with folded hands

sense.def: join one's hands in front of one's chest so as to be politely inactive; bow politely without doing anything

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.20; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Your majesty could have waited with folded hands

sense.def: take one's time and wait, lie in waiting

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.20; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: and the name of Hegemon would have been yours.

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.20; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: They led away the troops in retreat

sense.def: lead, command (an army, into attack or occasionally retreat); occasionally: lead along, show the way [guide][CA]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.20; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: neither land nor honour were gained.

sense.def: elevated social status; venerable position

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Instead, the clumsiness of your planners

sense.def: bring upon oneself Nab-ing; marker of passivisation, specifically self-inflicted suffering of an impact.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: Instead, the clumsiness of your planners

sense.def: doomed to ruin 亡國,亡主

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: invited imposition by a ruined state.

sense.def: clumsiness, incompetence

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: The fact that a ruined Chao did not collapse

sense.def: should have V-ed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: and a Ch'in destined for hegemony did not become hegemon

sense.def: assert oneself as hegemon; become leader, preeminent ruler, or hegemon; come to act as leading person; become the leading state

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: and a Ch'in destined for hegemony did not become hegemon

sense.def: should have V-ed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.21; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: casting away her weapons in fear and trembling,

sense.def: be struck with fear, tremble with fear

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.22; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: they assembled in Li-hsia;

sense.def: come together, assemble

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.22; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: both sides retired in exhaustion.

sense.def: withdraw

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.22; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: both sides retired in exhaustion.

sense.def: (of an army) withdraw

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.22; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: and beyond our borders they have found the limits of our armed strength.

sense.def: fathom the full extent of something

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.22; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 105

tls:text.tls:line: and beyond our borders they have found the limits of our armed strength.

sense.def: pertaining to weapons

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.23; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 106

tls:text.tls:line: If inside our state arms and armour grow dull and decay,

sense.def: armour and weapons; military equipment (not nececessarily only armour and weapons specifically, compare 仁義 "morality")

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.23; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 106

tls:text.tls:line: if our people are wearied,

sense.def: citizen; citizenry

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.23; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 106

tls:text.tls:line: if our people are wearied,

sense.def: be seriously worn out

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.23; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 106

tls:text.tls:line: our stores depleted,

sense.def: various stockpiles; accumulated resources of all kinds; the various accumulated resources

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.23; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 106

tls:text.tls:line: our fields abandoned

sense.def: the fields (of all kinds)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.23; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.128, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 106

tls:text.tls:line: and our granaries empty,

sense.def: the storehouses

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.24; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: take more care tomorrow than today.

sense.def: daily, every day; day in and day out; progressively generally: all the time

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.24; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: Who fears the Way

sense.def: pay careful attention to; show special care for

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.24; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: Of old when Chou was the Son of Heaven

sense.def: be the Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.24; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: he commanded the hosts of his empire.

sense.def: ZUO Xuan 2: armoured soldier; heavily armed soldier

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: King Wu led three thousand troops in the simplest of armour

sense.def: pristine and simple, unadorned and pure

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: King Wu led three thousand troops in the simplest of armour

sense.def: ZUO Xuan 2: armoured soldier; heavily armed soldier

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

sense.def: capture (an animal in chase); take prisoner (a person in war)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: seized his land

sense.def: occupy (territory), take possession of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: seized his land

sense.def: land; piece of land; territory; area; (possibly small) open space

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: and won over his people.

sense.def: to get (something)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: All the world was shocked.

sense.def: everyone in the world

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.25; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: All the world was shocked.

sense.def: feel distressed; feel so very distressed

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.26; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.26; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: and the city was on the very verge of destruction

sense.def: be about to

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.26; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: and the city was on the very verge of destruction

sense.def: be taken, be conquered

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.26; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

sense.def: covertly> furtively; in a hidden way, non-overtly

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.26; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: in secret

sense.def: get on one's way; go one's way; walk off; leave the scene; be on one's way

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.27; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: it would become Ch'in's.

sense.def: each of the objects singly, every object; each object in its own way 兼而 sometimes neutralised: all the objects in a blanket way

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.27; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 110

tls:text.tls:line: it would become Ch'in's.

sense.def: possession be gained of 可有

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.28; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 112

tls:text.tls:line: This is why I have risked death in the hope of seeing your majesty

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.28; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 112

sense.def: see from the distance, see from afar (sometimes: in a formal audience)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.28; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 112

tls:text.tls:line: This is why I have risked death in the hope of seeing your majesty

sense.def: you (as OBJECT)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.28; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 112

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.5.29; tr. Crump 1979 no. 107, p.130, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 112

sense.def: troops, armed forces; military support; military force

sense.def: It is best to V!

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:text.tls:line: 'You must ally yourself with the country of Wei, treat the country of Ch'u well,

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:text.tls:line: In this way the country of Wei will be severed from the district of Nan-yang,

sense.def: invade, make an incursion into; invasion, incursion; sometimes generally: attack (place or persons, eg 侵我 "attacked us")

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:text.tls:line: When the country of Chou knows by this that she will not be succoured,

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:text.tls:line: put your hand on the seals and registers of the empire,

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.66, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 115

tls:text.tls:line: and have under your arm the emperor, whereby to rule the land,

tls:text.tls:line: attends to the widening of his lands,

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: must enrich his people,

sense.def: aim to, aspire to; make it one's business, be preoccupied with the task of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: must enrich his people,

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: Now your majesty's lands are small and his people poor,

sense.def: your majesty's

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: Now your majesty's lands are small and his people poor,

sense.def: (of families or states etc.) have very little to live on; (of persons or of states) be poor 甚貧

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: so your minister would have you do what is easily done.

sense.def: work hard at

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: so your minister would have you do what is easily done.

sense.def: what is easy

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: indeed a mean land of the west

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: which does indeed observe only the rude usages of the Jung and Ti tribes,

sense.def: the barbarians, any barbarians

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: which does indeed observe only the rude usages of the Jung and Ti tribes,

sense.def: leader

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: it would be like a wolf in the flocks.

sense.def: wild beasts

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: it would be like a wolf in the flocks.

sense.def: a flock of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: would suffice to enrich your people and renew your troops.

sense.def: make rich

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: They would submit to you

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, by one stroke fame and wealth would both be yours,

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: and you would have beside the name of one who forbade cruelty and set confusion straight.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 3.7.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 57, p.67, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 117

tls:text.tls:line: and you would have beside the name of one who forbade cruelty and set confusion straight.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)

sense.def: attractive; wonderful; handsome, splendid, admirable; illustrious (name); elaborate and beautiful, lavish; of soil: be rich and good; of high quality; (also of sounds:) attractiveIn SJ & HS, 好女 and 美女 appear mainly as temptresses, gift objects that corrupt rulers; in this collocation, 好 and 美 would be "attractive." A very large number of females characterised simpl as 美 are prospective brides. 美 (but not 麗 ) is often used in connection with abstracta, such as deeds, words, customs and virtues. [JP]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.68, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: in the west, your virtue would be great in Ch'in,

sense.def: (cause to feel well-disposed towards>) win favour with, put someone in one's debt

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而私商於之地以為利也，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.68, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: and for yourself you would have the advantage of the lands of Shang-yy.

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.68, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: Here then is a single plan with three benefits devolving! '

sense.def: objective aimed at 得計 "achieve one's aims"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.68, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: Here then is a single plan with three benefits devolving! '

sense.def: advantages

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: and bruited it about his court,

sense.def: declare N1 to N2

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: and bruited it about his court,

sense.def: the court

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: 'We have secured six hundred li square of the Shang-yy lands.'

sense.def: I (used by a ruler referring to himself)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: All his courtiers who heard or held audience congratulated him,

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: offered no felicitations.

sense.def: as the only one; as one person

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: offered no felicitations.

sense.def: congratulate a contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: said the king,

sense.def: I (used by a ruler referring to himself)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: said the king,

sense.def: molest; cause trouble for (someone) by asking him to take action

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 133

tls:text.tls:line: said the king,

sense.def: soldier, a body of soldiers

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: and my attendants all tender congratulations,

sense.def: congratulate a contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: but you, sir, do not.

sense.def: as the only one; as one person

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: so I hesitate to present my compliments rashly.'

sense.def: mistakenly, wrongly; arbitrarilyBUDDH: deludedly; in a deluded way; falsely

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: so I hesitate to present my compliments rashly.'

sense.def: congratulate a contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: is because you have Ch'i as your ally.

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重
