tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: and why should Ch'in treat a state thus isolated with respect?

sense.def: be isolated; be without relations to others

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: It is not part of Ch'in's plan

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136-

tls:text.tls:line: It is not part of Ch'in's plan

sense.def: isolated, without support; lonely; solitary

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: But if you sever relations first so that you may be awarded land later

sense.def: make demands concerning (performance of duty)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: then you are certain to be duped by Chang Yi -

sense.def: (receive>) be on the receiving end of Nab-ing 受公仲侈之怨也(!)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and if you are cheated by Chang Yi

sense.def: (receive>) be on the receiving end of Nab-ing 受公仲侈之怨也(!)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: your majesty will truly have cause to lament.

sense.def: utter sighs of regret about, regret bitterly

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and broken relations in the north with Ch'i,

sense.def: good relations with N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'You, sir, are to stop up your lips

sense.def: put an end to; stop; reduce radically

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'You, sir, are to stop up your lips

sense.def: mouth

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'You, sir, are to stop up your lips

sense.def: don't verb any object 無言; don't Vt at any time "don't speak!"; so as not to

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'You, sir, are to stop up your lips

sense.def: articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and wait upon my management!'

sense.def: wait for (something desirable); wait until; wait for (a period of time); expect

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: sent yet another to confirm it.

sense.def: again

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: Chang Yi returned to Ch'in

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: he pretended illness and held no audience.

sense.def: adduce as a pretext 稱病

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: he pretended illness and held no audience.

sense.def: (of a ruler) attend court; (if subjects) go to court; pay a formal visit at court to show one's respect

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: asked the king of Ch'u

sense.def: think that the N Vs; consider that S;

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and sent a bravo to Ch'i to revile its king.

sense.def: courageous; bold 勇士

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and sent a bravo to Ch'i to revile its king.

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.9; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and sent a bravo to Ch'i to revile its king.

sense.def: LISAO: swear at, vent one's anger at, often as a bystander or not face-to-face; expostulate against

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: Knowing that Ch'u had broken with Ch'i,

sense.def: break off relations with

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'I am but a humble man -

sense.def: as, in one's capacity as 以編戶之民 "as a simple person from an ordinary home"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.10; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'I am but a humble man -

sense.def: be just an ordinary person;

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Ch'u was furious

sense.def: make a report, as requested, typically to authorities

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and he raised an army to strike Ch'in.

sense.def: mobilise (an army); raise (an army for a campaign)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.11; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: asked Ch'en Chen.

sense.def: express oneself in words 能言; speak up; 提意見, come up with statements, come up with one's personal opinions; state one's personal opinion of things; make a proposal

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

sense.def: mistaken, wrong

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王不如因而賂之一名都，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and join them against Ch'i.

sense.def: bribe N1 with gift of N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王不如因而賂之一名都，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and join them against Ch'i.

sense.def: famous, renouned名師 "famous army"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是我亡於秦而取償於齊也。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: Is not our state then still without loss?

sense.def: get N1 from N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是我亡於秦而取償於齊也。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: Is not our state then still without loss?

sense.def: reward; compensation

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: 'Today my lord has separated from Ch'i

sense.def: still

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: and been cheated by Ch'in;

sense.def: break off relations with

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.12; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.69, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: then we may be certain of disaster.'

sense.def: good relations with N

sense.def: mobilise

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

sense.def: read braads: be defeated by N 再敗楚師 "be defeated by the Chu army for a second time" (Many ATTRIBUTIONS NEED TO BE MOVED TO FAIL)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故楚之土壤士民非削弱，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故楚之土壤士民非削弱，

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'u's land and peoples remained intact

sense.def: citizen; citizenry

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故楚之土壤士民非削弱，

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'u's land and peoples remained intact

sense.def: be decimated so as to be weakened as a result

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: while believing too much of Chang Yi.]

sense.def: by mistake, mistakenly; through insouciance

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.1.13; tr. Crump 1979 no. 58, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 136

tls:text.tls:line: while believing too much of Chang Yi.]

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140 Ch'en Chen, the songs of Wu, and the quarrelling tigers

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'u broke off relations with Ch'i

sense.def: break off relations with

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140 Ch'en Chen, the songs of Wu, and the quarrelling tigers

tls:text.tls:line: 'is to cede territory in the east to Ch'i

sense.def: had better, should ideally, should under the circumstances, should given the alternatives that the situation presents

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140 Ch'en Chen, the songs of Wu, and the quarrelling tigers

tls:text.tls:line: while you negotiate with Ch'in in the West.'

sense.def: negotiate for peace with N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: 'and you and I know each other of old.

sense.def: friends

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: I lacked cleverness

sense.def: display shrewd eloquence; have shrewd eloquence 寡人不佞

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: and attended not in person to the affairs of my state.

sense.def: deal with N personally

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: and I am advised from one quarter that advantage would be gained by taking sides,

sense.def: be expedient, advisable, be the right thing to do; be the profitable thing to do

tls:text.tls:srcline: 子獨不可以忠為子主計，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: But you, sir, might you not keep faith with the schemes you make for your present master

sense.def: commitment; devoted effort, duty of loyal devotion; trustiness; the doing of one's loyal best 臣德也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 子獨不可以忠為子主計，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: But you, sir, might you not keep faith with the schemes you make for your present master

sense.def: make calculated plans

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

sense.def: very much, strongly; also: too much, excessively before VP: very; emphatic after VP: enormously, tremendously

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: 'There he was much cherished by the king

sense.def: be especially fond of (also abstract things)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: the king's man asked.

sense.def: or conceivably?, or perhaps?

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: the king's man asked.

sense.def: be wistful; be homesick??

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:text.tls:line: "but when he is truly sick for home he sings songs of Wu."

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.2.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 59, p.70, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 140

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.6.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 66, p 75, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 144

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.6.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 66, p 75, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 144

tls:text.tls:line: 'Your servant recalls that Chang Yi annexed Pa and Shu for Ch'in in the west,

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.6.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 66, p 75, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 144

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天下不以為多張儀而賢先王。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.6.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 66, p 75, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 144

tls:text.tls:line: But the empire did not think more of Chang Yi; it praised the virtue of his ruler, your ancestor.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天下不以為多張儀而賢先王。

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.8.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 68, p 77 Kan Mao procures valour with gold and takes the town of Yi-yang

tls:text.tls:srcline: 公孫衍、樗里疾挫我於內，

tls:text.tls:line: to help Ch'in defray the cost of sacrifices for her aid.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92

tls:text.tls:line: to help Ch'in defray the cost of sacrifices for her aid.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92

tls:text.tls:line: But all this is beyond the knowledge of an emissary.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92

tls:text.tls:line: But all this is beyond the knowledge of an emissary.

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92

tls:text.tls:line: I am here merely to offer you forty thousand armed troops.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

sense.def: cause to burst out (a carbuncle etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

sense.def: many of the object N; much of the object stuff

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.15.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 88, p 92, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165 The queen of Ch'in an her lover

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165 The queen of Ch'in an her lover

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165 The queen of Ch'in an her lover

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165 The queen of Ch'in an her lover

tls:text.tls:line: when she died.

sense.def: person buried to honour a distinguished deceased individual

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165 The queen of Ch'in an her lover

tls:text.tls:line: This troubled Wei Ch'ou.

sense.def: be vexed about; find ominous; be upset by, be greatly worried about, regard as disastrous (mostly a future prospect); be upset about; be distressed by

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:text.tls:line: If the dead are sentinent, your highness,

tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:text.tls:line: and certainly no time left for further dalliance with Wei Ch'ou.'

sense.def: have the time to, have the opportunity to

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:text.tls:line: and certainly no time left for further dalliance with Wei Ch'ou.'

sense.def: then, under such circumstances DELETE

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:text.tls:line: and certainly no time left for further dalliance with Wei Ch'ou.'

sense.def: have intimate emotional and sexual improper relations with

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 4.16.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 98, p 111, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 165

tls:text.tls:line: and certainly no time left for further dalliance with Wei Ch'ou.'

sense.def: particle introducing rhetorical questions

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: The Duke of Hsyeh spoke the Wei Jan on Wei's behalf:

sense.def: name of a small state, became part of Qí

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: The Duke of Hsyeh spoke the Wei Jan on Wei's behalf:

sense.def: Unger no. 862

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: and make his control over the empire complete.

sense.def: rescue from (a sad situation), save from (disaster)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: You will certainly be diminished if he succeeds.

sense.def: become weaker, we weakened

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'i and Ch'in will draw closer together so that they may bring the Three Chin under their control,

sense.def: deal with administratively; deal with effectively; come to be in effective control of, dominate; take spiritual charge of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: and Ly Li will be made minister of both states.

sense.def: all

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86 The duke of Hsüeh urges the destruction of Ch'i

tls:text.tls:line: at the expense of bringing greater honour to Ly Li,126

sense.def: cause to be important, introduce as politically important

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君不如勸秦王令弊邑卒攻齊之事。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: The best thing you can do is to urge the king of Ch'in to command my king127 to press his attack on Ch'i;

sense.def: had better, should ideally, should under the circumstances, should given the alternatives that the situation presents

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君不如勸秦王令弊邑卒攻齊之事。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: The best thing you can do is to urge the king of Ch'in to command my king127 to press his attack on Ch'i;

sense.def: encourage somebody to do something

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君不如勸秦王令弊邑卒攻齊之事。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: The best thing you can do is to urge the king of Ch'in to command my king127 to press his attack on Ch'i;

sense.def: comand (the SUBJECT to PREDICATE, on a level inferior to lìng 令)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: and I shall request, when Ch'i is broken,

sense.def: be defeated, be completely routed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: that all the territories gained be put in fief to you.

sense.def: give the territory N2 to N1 as a feof

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: Wen Ch'i is destroyed Chin [i.e. Wei] will be strong;

sense.def: be defeated, be completely routed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: Wen Ch'i is destroyed Chin [i.e. Wei] will be strong;

sense.def: become strong; gain in strength; become a superpower

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: when Chin is strong the king of Ch'in will fear her

sense.def: be afraid of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: when Chin is strong the king of Ch'in will fear her

sense.def: current state of physical or political strength; current power; current energy

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: and must make much of you so that you can ally Chin to him.

sense.def: cause to be important, introduce as politically important

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: and must make much of you so that you can ally Chin to him.

sense.def: attack successfully, take or conquer (a city or a city state) by military force; obtain (a desirable position); win the allegiance of (the people)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: Ly Li will be back in favour

sense.def: be employed, get employed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: and you will truly be in difficulty.'

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.1.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 80, p 86

tls:text.tls:line: and you will truly be in difficulty.'

sense.def: be in a hopeless position; be in an intellectually hopeless position, be lost for words; be at one's wit's end (See CONFUSED)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in's guest minister Tsao said to Marquis Jang:

sense.def: Invited Senior Minister Npr (title in Qin)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: 'Ch'in gave you the fief of T'ao

sense.def: enfeof N1 in N2 於x or 以x

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: and because of that she has dominated the empire for many years.

sense.def: relying on, on this basis

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: and because of that she has dominated the empire for many years.

sense.def: rule over as a ruler; lord it over (subjects or a state)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: If an attack on Ch'i succeeds,

sense.def: physical action; action; undertaking; concrete performance

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: T'ao will become enormously strong.

sense.def: large state commanding 10 000 war chariots

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: It will be chief among all the smaller states

sense.def: be the senior of> to govern (over somebody); to be the leader (of somebody)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: and bring them all to the court of her ruler.

sense.def: pay a formal visit to N at his court; sometimes also to a wife of a deceased person or to a distinguished person 朝相如 "visit Sima Xiangru"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: and bring them all to the court of her ruler.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: This is the very stuff of hegemony!

sense.def: leader; paramount leader, hegemon 五霸

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171 The fief of T'ao

tls:text.tls:line: is the very instrument of T'ao's survival.

sense.def: causal mechanism; crucial mechanism; underlying mechanism

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: why not send a man to say this to the minister of Yen:

sense.def: prime minister

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: "A sage cannot create the proper time

sense.def: PRODUCE> to invent, to create for the first time; create anew; create out of nothing

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: "A sage cannot create the proper time

sense.def: the right time; right moment, an opportunity 大時; the moment for something; see also 遇時 "encounter opportunities"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: but he will never mistake it when it arrives.

sense.def: overlook, fail to notice; fail to use; fail to take proper note of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: Shun was good

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: but had he never met Yao

sense.def: meet by coincidence; sometimes generally: get to meet, have the opportunity to meet (someone who is hard to meet, or whom it is a good fortune to get to meet); run into, be exposed to (situations)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: he could not have become emperor.

sense.def: become (ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.2.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 89, p 94, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 171

tls:text.tls:line: he could not have become emperor.

sense.def: be the Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182 Fan-tzu's letter

tls:text.tls:line: Those whose labours are great he pays well.

sense.def: be richly supplied, be abundant, lavish; be substantial; be abundant in number; be affluent

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182 Fan-tzu's letter

tls:text.tls:line: Those who accomplish much he gives high rank.

sense.def: official high formal rank; appointments to official ranks

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182 Fan-tzu's letter

tls:text.tls:line: Those who accomplish much he gives high rank.

sense.def: be noble; be honoured; be deserving of respect or veneration 至尊

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182 Fan-tzu's letter

tls:text.tls:line: Those who can lead he appoints to high office.

sense.def: official duties; bureau; 五官 "five bureaus"; office, official position NB: the distinction between the offices as such and their holders is blurred for very good reasons, since officials acted as representatives of their bureau.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If my words seem good to you

sense.def: supposing as a purely hypothetical and theoretical, or at least remote, possibility

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If my words seem good to you

sense.def: statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If my words seem good to you

sense.def: be acceptable, justified and true

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If you do not use them in the future,

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: There is a saying,

sense.def: proverb; sometimes also attributed to a place 宋人語曰

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: "The merely human king rewards those whom he loves

sense.def: make a reward to (a person); award ritual presents to (someone) in compensation for his services

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: "The merely human king rewards those whom he loves

sense.def: be especially fond of (also abstract things)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and punishes those not in his favour.

sense.def: condemn to the payment of a fine or some other form of mild punishment; generally: to punish

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: his rewards must go to the accomplished

sense.def: be attributed to N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: his rewards must go to the accomplished

sense.def: person of substantial meritorious achievements BHT also has the explicit 有功者, but in subject position.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今臣之胸不足以當椹質，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: At present I have not offended enough for the headman's block

sense.def: chopping block

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今臣之胸不足以當椹質，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: At present I have not offended enough for the headman's block

sense.def: chopping block

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今臣之胸不足以當椹質，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: At present I have not offended enough for the headman's block

sense.def: n: executioner's chopping block (used in executions)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and his axe

sense.def: waist

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and his axe

sense.def: executioner's axe

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈敢以疑事嘗試於王乎？

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: so would I be likely to experiment with dubious schemes for your majesty?

sense.def: dubious; doubtful

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈敢以疑事嘗試於王乎？

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: so would I be likely to experiment with dubious schemes for your majesty?

sense.def: attempt to do something for N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: However that may be, if you hold me in low esteem

sense.def: be base; be of low status; be of low moral worth

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and choose to abuse me

sense.def: treat without serious respect so as to humiliate> treat with insulting nonchalance

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: you cannot avoid slighting the man who recommended me -

sense.def: give responsibilities to; give responsibilities for something to someone, put in charge of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and if that happens will he ever again argue the merits152 of anyone before your majesty?

sense.def: in the future, afterwards

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and if that happens will he ever again argue the merits152 of anyone before your majesty?

sense.def: will never (in generalisations); at no time (during a certain period), never (無有 there never are any)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 101, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and if that happens will he ever again argue the merits152 of anyone before your majesty?

sense.def: frequent a place

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: these four great treasures

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: to make them objects know throughout the empire.

sense.def: famous, renouned名師 "famous army"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: Is it not also probable then that even your sage majesty

sense.def: sagely, sagacious

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: Is it not also probable then that even your sage majesty

sense.def: Your Majesty

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: may some day reject something of possible value to his state?

sense.def: make abundant; maximise; cause to be richly supplied, enrich

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: may some day reject something of possible value to his state?

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: I have heard that you look within your own state

sense.def: be of substantial benefit to, profit substantially

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: but seek among the Lords

sense.def: be of substantial benefit to, profit substantially

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: the Feudal Lords are not covetous of their own advantage.153

sense.def: presume to V; arrogate to oneself the authority to V; usurp the authority of V-ing

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: the Feudal Lords are not covetous of their own advantage.153

sense.def: benefit others; seek benefit

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: A good physician knows whether his patient's illness is critical or not,

sense.def: fine; competent; efficient; excellent; preferred

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: just as a sage ruler knows what actions make for success or failure.

sense.def: sagely, sagacious

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: just as a sage ruler knows what actions make for success or failure.

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If a thing is beneficial he will act upon it,

sense.def: be advantageous; be profitable, be advisable

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: if harmful he will discard it.

sense.def: be harmful; do damage to others; be harmful in any way; be a harmful thing to do

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: if harmful he will discard it.

sense.def: give up, release; opt against, reject as a choice; give up on; set aside; throw away

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If he is not sure which it is he will cautiously test it.

sense.def: be doubtful (of situations), be left in doubt (of people)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If he is not sure which it is he will cautiously test it.

sense.def: make an attempt at, give a try

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If he acts thus, the sages Yao, Shun, Yy, and T'ang could come back to life

sense.def: even if

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: If he acts thus, the sages Yao, Shun, Yy, and T'ang could come back to life

sense.def: again (as in 復戰 "fight again, renew battle".(often of reverting to an original state:) again (失而復得"lose but regain again") occasionally and rarely adversative: on the contrary; (with negatives, not) any more, not any longer; but again)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 語之至者，臣不敢載之於書；

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: The most pertinent thing I have to say I dare not write in this letter;

sense.def: the ultimate point, the extreme manifestation

tls:text.tls:srcline: 語之至者，臣不敢載之於書；

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: The most pertinent thing I have to say I dare not write in this letter;

sense.def: record in N, record on N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 語之至者，臣不敢載之於書；

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: The most pertinent thing I have to say I dare not write in this letter;

sense.def: letter

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and things less important than those I have mentioned are not worth saying at all.

sense.def: the shallow points

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and things less important than those I have mentioned are not worth saying at all.

sense.def: likewise, nonetheless; meanwhile (colloquial)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: that I will prove stupid and not in accord with your thinking?

sense.def: fit with

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.7; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 182

tls:text.tls:line: and allow me an audience to present my important statements.'

sense.def: your excellency

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 183

tls:text.tls:line: The letter was sent up to the king of Ch'in

sense.def: letter

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 183

tls:text.tls:line: and he was delighted by it.

sense.def: find fully satisfactory, delight in as ideal; be delighted with; appreciate positively 甚悅之

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.8.8; tr. Crump 1979 no. 93, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 183

tls:text.tls:line: He apologized to Wang Chi

sense.def: HF 2.7.29: apologise to; make apologies for a misdeed (on behalf of someone)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: 'We have long felt it proper to recieve instruction from you in person.

sense.def: should haveLi Chunfeng (AD 656) on JZ 2.0, Liu Hui's comm: 宜云 "It (the text) should have said: "...", but what does say is: "...". 脫錯也 "That is a mistake by omission."

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: But most recently there has been the pressing affair of the Yi-ch'ǖ54

sense.def: temporary: be urgent; feel desperate, get desperate; generally, as a matter of personal character: be rash, hot-headed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: and I have seen the queen mother almost daily.

sense.def: daily, every day; day in and day out; progressively generally: all the time

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: Now the Yi-ch'y trouble is ended

sense.def: typically of situations and conditions: stop, cease, finish

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: I consider myself ignorant and inept,

sense.def: I (physically); my body/person

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: I consider myself ignorant and inept,

sense.def: be superbly competent, nimble of mind; intelligent; subtle in the exercise of duties

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 102, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 1i4 The king of Ch'in kneels to Fan Chü and hears his views on international affairs

tls:text.tls:line: After this Fan Chy paid his respects and withdrew.

sense.def: decline politely a contextually determinate offer N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: were much changed in countenance and colour!

sense.def: effect a change on something from a original state, typically, but not always, from a commendable, constant or ordinary state

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: were much changed in countenance and colour!

sense.def: outer facial expression as expressive of an inner mental state or psychological disposition; spirit displayed

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: were much changed in countenance and colour!

sense.def: change fundamentally, make a fundamental change to

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: were much changed in countenance and colour!

sense.def: face, especially overall shape of face

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Ch'in then sealed himself off from his attendants,

sense.def: block off; keep away

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Ch'in then sealed himself off from his attendants,

sense.def: the members of the political entourage (of a king etc), aide; senior employees of a household

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: and in the empty palace

sense.def: be literally empty (like storehouses etc)

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: he knelt formally.

sense.def: kneel on the floor and kowtow, as a sign of respect and submissiveness; kneel

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: 'Would it please you to instruct me in some matter, sir?'

sense.def: in polite formulae: gracefully; by your grace; kindly, generously 願大王幸V

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:text.tls:line: 'Would it please you to instruct me in some matter, sir?'

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 184

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 185

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 185

tls:text.tls:line: 'Perhaps, good sir, you would not be pleased to teach me?'

sense.def: in polite formulae: gracefully; by your grace; kindly, generously 願大王幸V

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.9.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 94, p 103, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 185

tls:text.tls:line: 'Perhaps, good sir, you would not be pleased to teach me?'

sense.def: instruct, give instruction to; train up (prototypically military); train up properly, instruct properly

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)

sense.def: and that is all, contraction of 而已 (note the problems of scope: sometimes what the restrictive quantification quantifies over is only the subject, sometimes only the object, and sometimes the whole verb phrase, and at still other times the main verb only. These distinctions have not so far been implemented in tls.)

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: 'In Cheng they call jade which has not been worked "pure";

sense.def: (an N) which (V-s) 葉實可啄食者 SW: 凡物無乳者

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: in Chou they call fresh-dressed rats which have not yet been preserved, "pure".

sense.def: the (typically elevated) people in Npl [This should probably be subsumed under the general "def.plur" semantic category, and this is easily done. However the examples form a neat set of some interest, so I keep them together. CH]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: in Chou they call fresh-dressed rats which have not yet been preserved, "pure".

sense.def: (an N) which (V-s) 葉實可啄食者 SW: 凡物無乳者

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: A man of Chou carrying fresh-dressed rats passed a Cheng merchant and asked him

sense.def: a person/man from Npl

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: A man of Chou carrying fresh-dressed rats passed a Cheng merchant and asked him

sense.def: pass by someone or some place, come upon someone (read guō 過); pass by something (e.g. ruler's seat)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: if he wanted to buy some "pures".

sense.def: buy, acquire (official positions) for money; go out to buy; try to buy; buy (a person from his employer)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: The merchant replied

sense.def: (sedentory) merchant; merchant [Perhaps this should be taken as a primary noun? 待考]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198 A dialect word

tls:text.tls:line: that he did.

sense.def: (wish) to do this

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198

tls:text.tls:line: dressed rats

sense.def: rodent; rat; mouse

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198

tls:text.tls:line: he declined them.

sense.def: beg pardon; offer one's apologies, apologise; apologise for one's misdeeds

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今平原君自以賢，顯名於天下，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198

tls:text.tls:line: Now Lord P'ing-yyan [Kung-tzu Sheng]162 is busy getting himself a name for virtue throughout the empire.

sense.def: show off N1 to N2, make a show of N1 for N2

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198

tls:text.tls:line: yet rulers everywhere still respect him.

sense.def: still, nonetheless

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198

tls:text.tls:line: are less intelligent than the Cheng merchant.

sense.def: (sedentory) merchant; merchant [Perhaps this should be taken as a primary noun? 待考]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.13.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 100, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 198

tls:text.tls:line: They are so dazzled by the word "pure"

sense.def: be blinded (and deceived) by

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202 The dogs and the bone

tls:text.tls:line: 'Allow me to get rid of them. [For 令 one should probably read 今CH]

sense.def: remove, get rid of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 秦於天下之士非有怨也，

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202 The dogs and the bone

tls:text.tls:line: Ch'in has no quarrel with the officers of the empire.

sense.def: not at all; by no means; the fact is that not (perhaps this should be)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202 The dogs and the bone

tls:text.tls:line: simply because each seeks wealth and fame for himself.

sense.def: object marker: 把(這個東西) also: 以。。。而。。。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202 The dogs and the bone

tls:text.tls:line: simply because each seeks wealth and fame for himself.

sense.def: (often with coverbs:) non contrastive "himself, herself"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.1; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202 The dogs and the bone

tls:text.tls:line: simply because each seeks wealth and fame for himself.

sense.def: make rich and noble

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: Look at your own hounds - [王臣CH]

sense.def: originally: puppy, also the young of bears and tigers; mostely generally: dog

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: some are sleeping,

sense.def: sleep; find rest; be in bed; also of dogs: lie down to sleep

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: In any case, they are not fighting.

sense.def: fight against N, struggle with N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: In any case, they are not fighting.

sense.def: wrestle, engage in fighting

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: But throw a bone to them

sense.def: cast the object N1 in the the place N2; throw N1 before N2

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: But throw a bone to them

sense.def: bone, typically of a dead human or animal; but also, occasionally in a living creature

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 202

tls:text.tls:line: and they will be on their feet in an instant, snapping at each other.

sense.def: bite 相牙 "bite each other"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: and give a great banquet.

sense.def: drink wine in social company as a formal arrangement, attend a wine-drinking occasion

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: will be as close as brothers to Ch'in.'

sense.def: "brother"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今令人復載五十金隨公。」

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: We are sending another five thousand in gold after you.'

sense.def: ensue; follow behind (rather than go in front); trail behind and follow

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今令人復載五十金隨公。」

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: We are sending another five thousand in gold after you.'

sense.def: load into a vehicle; load up; transport, bring along; take along in a vehicle

tls:text.tls:srcline: 今令人復載五十金隨公。」

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: We are sending another five thousand in gold after you.'

sense.def: you, sir

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: were fighting one another.

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.14.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 101, p 113, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: were fighting one another.

sense.def: fight against N, struggle with N

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

sense.def: capture (an animal in chase); take prisoner (a person in war)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: 'He did.'

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: 'He did.'

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.2; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: the king of Ch'in will be king of us all166

sense.def: gain royal supremacy, reign supreme; become a king, get to rule as king; become a proper king

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: without the loss of a single armoured soldier.

sense.def: lose (e.g. a fingernail); ZGC: have run away from one, lose from one's herd (a goat)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: without the loss of a single armoured soldier.

sense.def: ZUO Xuan 2: armoured soldier; heavily armed soldier

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: did not better this record.

sense.def: exceed, surpass; be better than; go beyond (a limit, a number)

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: the king of Ch'in is king of us all,

sense.def: gain royal supremacy, reign supreme; become a king, get to rule as king; become a proper king

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

tls:text.tls:line: and Lord Wu-an is one of the Three Nobles,

sense.def: a senior minister

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 114, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 203

sense.def: subject

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不樂為秦民之日固久矣。

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: have disliked the thought of being Ch'in subjects for a long time!

sense.def: be delighted when V-ing; de delighted to V; take delight in V-ing

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不樂為秦民之日固久矣。

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

sense.def: be the people from N

sense.def: amount of time; a space of time; the time

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不樂為秦民之日固久矣。

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: have disliked the thought of being Ch'in subjects for a long time!

sense.def: surely, doubtlessly; certainly; inherently

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.15.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 102, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason it is better to [? arrange for Chao tō67 cede lands]

sense.def: It is best to V!

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.1, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205 The king of Ch'in tests Marquis Ying's philosophical resignation and finds it insincere

tls:text.tls:line: by the loss of your fief?'

sense.def: presumably, - I suppose -, perhaps; apparently???

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.1, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205 The king of Ch'in tests Marquis Ying's philosophical resignation and finds it insincere

tls:text.tls:line: by the loss of your fief?'

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.1, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205 The king of Ch'in tests Marquis Ying's philosophical resignation and finds it insincere

tls:text.tls:line: 'I am not.'

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.2, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: replied Marquis Ying.

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.2, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: "You loved your son

sense.def: honorific in informal conversation: you; also n - pro: "you my Duke"; used both as subject and as object

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.2, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: yet now he is dead you show no grief.

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.2, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: and when I had none I did not grieve.

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.2, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: it has become just as it was when I had no son.

sense.def: period of time; era; age; times 文公之時

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.2, tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: Why should I grieve over him?"

sense.def: why?

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: What should grieve me about that?'

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.3; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 115, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: What should grieve me about that?'

sense.def: worry, spend one's time worrying; show serious concern; be fretful

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: The King of Ch'in did not think the explanation proper

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: if a single one of my cities is besieged,

sense.def: be besieged

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: food is tasteless in my mouth

sense.def: consider as sweet, experience as savoury; regard as delicious

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: and I can fin no ease in my bed.

sense.def: mat to sit on, usually, on festive occasions, this mat being put on another rough mat on the floor; sometimes: mat to sleep on

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: Yet Marquis Ying has lost all his territory

sense.def: lose (e.g. a fingernail); ZGC: have run away from one, lose from one's herd (a goat)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: and says he feels no grief.

sense.def: say that one V-s

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: Can these be his real feelings?'

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 205

tls:text.tls:line: said Meng Ao,

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.5; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 208

tls:text.tls:line: that the king of Ch'in uses you as his teacher

sense.def: treat as a teacher, take as a guiding authority; imitate as teacher

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 208

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 208

tls:text.tls:line: 'I shall leave that matter in your hands.'

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 208

sense.def: informal: you

tls:text.tls:line: the king of Ch'in discounted his words

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.loc: ZGC 5.16.6; tr. Crump 1979 no. 103, p 116, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 208

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Ch'i assented respectfully

sense.def: agree to do the contextually determinate thing, say yes 唯而不諾

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故韓、魏之所以重與秦戰而輕為之臣也。

tls:line.loc: ZGC 8.16.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.126 p. 157, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 335

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 9.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.141 p. 173, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 347 Ch'i prefers attacking an internally weakened Yen to aiding her ally Han

tls:text.tls:line: King Tzu-k'uai has given his minister Tzu-chih the throne of Yen

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 9.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.141 p. 173, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 347 Ch'i prefers attacking an internally weakened Yen to aiding her ally Han

tls:text.tls:line: but the people of that state have not accepted him

tls:line.loc: ZGC 9.1.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.141 p. 173, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 347 Ch'i prefers attacking an internally weakened Yen to aiding her ally Han

tls:line.loc: ZGC 9.2.4; tr. Crump 1979 no.143 p. 176, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 347

tls:line.loc: ZGC 10.1.5; tr. Crump 1979 no.145 p.179, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 367

tls:text.tls:line: 'I beg your leave to go to Ch'u for you

sense.def: 子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 10.1.6; tr. Crump 1979 no.145 p.179, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 367 II.

tls:line.loc: ZGC 10.9.2; tr. Crump 1979 no.153 p.187, ed. Shanghaiguji p. 380

tls:line.loc: ZGC 11.1; tr. Crump 1979 no.154 p.189

tls:text.tls:line: was once its envoy to Chao and because of that sought to make himself chief minister in Chung-shan.

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 4. 2; tr. Crump 1979 no.492, p 578f, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1177

tls:text.tls:line: to make himself your chief minister?'

sense.def: (often with coverbs:) non contrastive "himself, herself"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 6. 3; tr. Crump 1979 no.494, p 580, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1180

tls:text.tls:line: I have been here and have travelled from boundary to boundary

sense.def: arrive at (a place); come to (a place)

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 6. 4; tr. Crump 1979 no.494, p 580f, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1180

tls:text.tls:line: Indeed, her face and hair (cab)

sense.def: using （often: all one's) strength, powerfully, with one's power/strength; with all one's strength 力田 "work hard in agriculture"

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 10. 13; tr. Crump 1979 no.104, p 119, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1189

tls:text.tls:line: or natural order.

sense.def: what is so of itself

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 10. 13; tr. Crump 1979 no.104, p 119, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1189

tls:text.tls:line: or natural order.

sense.def: natural pattern followed by all things

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 10. 13; tr. Crump 1979 no.104, p 119, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1189

tls:text.tls:line: or natural order.

sense.def: the natural course of things; what is naturally so

tls:line.title: 戰國策(en)
tls:line.loc: ZGC 33. 10. 14; tr. Crump 1979 no.104, p 119, ed. Shanghai Guji p. 1189

tls:text.tls:line: allowing her to plough and harvest and replenish her supplies,

sense.def: engage in agricultural work
